      • showDialogFont

        public java.awt.Font showDialogFont(java.awt.Font start)
        Show the dialog and wit user choice
        Parameters:
        start - Font to start with. You can use null if you want use default font to start. Default is Arial, plain, 12 OR last choose
        Returns:
        Choose font or null if no choice
